#import required modules

import pyodbc
import openpyxl
from openpyxl import load_workbook
from openpyxl.utils.dataframe import dataframe_to_rows
from openpyxl.worksheet.table import Table, TableStyleInfo
import pandas as pd
from pyspark.sql import Row, SparkSession
import pyspark.sql.functions as F
import pyspark.sql.types as T
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.types import *

#pull in target parameter values from synapse pipeline

target_object_name='global_superstore'
object_type='parquet'


target_account_name = "etlstoragepocaccount"
target_container_name = "etlstoragepocfilesystem"
target_relative_path = "csv"

#pull in source parameter values from synapse pipeline (TO BE CHANGED TO KEY VAULT CREDENTIALS)
jdbcHostname = "sqlserverdataqualitypoc.database.windows.net"
jdbcDatabase = "sqldbdataqualitypoc"
jdbcPort = "1433"
username = "serveradminlogindatadqualitypoc@sqlserverdataqualitypoc"
password = "@1234Password"
jdbcUrl = "jdbc:sqlserver://{0}:{1};database={2}".format(jdbcHostname, jdbcPort, jdbcDatabase)
connectionProperties = {
    "user" : username,
    "password" : password,
    "driver" : "com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.SQLServerDriver"
    }

source_account_name = "etlstoragepocaccount"
source_container_name = "etlstoragepocfilesystem"
source_relative_path = "parquet"

source_object_name='Global_Superstore'

#Get Target DataFrame

adls_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (target_container_name, target_account_name, target_relative_path)

df1 = spark.read.option('header', 'true') \
                .option('delimiter', ',') \
                .csv(adls_path + '/'+target_object_name+'.csv')

df1.createOrReplaceGlobalTempView("df1_view")

#Get Source DataFrame
if object_type=='sql':
  pushdown_query = "(Select * from "+source_object_name+") source_object"
  df = spark.read.jdbc(url=jdbcUrl, table=pushdown_query, properties=connectionProperties)

if object_type=='parquet':
  adls_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (source_container_name, source_account_name, source_relative_path)
  df = spark.read.load(adls_path + '/'+source_object_name+'/', format='parquet')


df.createOrReplaceGlobalTempView("df_view")

#condition checks for SQL DB source

if object_type=='sql':

    #get check results
    meta_flag=metadata_check("df_view","df1_view")
    count_flag=count_check("df_view","df1_view")
    null_flag=null_check("df_view","df1_view")
    
    #get current date
    from datetime import date
    current_date = str(date.today())

    #getMaximimRunIDfromPipelineSummaryTable for the object
    pushdown_query = "(Select * from sqldbschema.Pipeline_Summary) Pipeline_Summary"
    df_pipleline_summ = spark.read.jdbc(url=jdbcUrl, table=pushdown_query, properties=connectionProperties)
    df_pipleline_summ.registerTempTable('Pipeline_Summary')
    run_id=spark.sql("select ifnull(max(run_id)+1,1) from Pipeline_Summary where Table_Name ='"+target_object_name+"' and run_date='"+current_date+"'").first()[0]

    #update IngestionSummary table
    columns = StructType([StructField("Table_name", StringType(), False),
                      StructField("Run_Date", StringType(), False),
                      StructField("Run_ID", IntegerType(), False),
                      StructField("Check_Type", StringType(), False),
                      StructField("Status", StringType(), False)])                    
    
    vals_temp_count=[(target_object_name,current_date,run_id,'Count Check',count_flag)]
    df_temp_count = spark.createDataFrame(vals_temp_count, columns) 
    vals_temp_null=[(target_object_name,current_date,run_id,'Null Check',null_flag)]
    df_temp_null = spark.createDataFrame(vals_temp_null, columns) 
    vals_temp_meta=[(target_object_name,current_date,run_id,'Metadata Check',meta_flag)]
    df_temp_meta = spark.createDataFrame(vals_temp_meta, columns) 
    df_ingestionsummary=df_temp_count.union(df_temp_null).union(df_temp_meta)

    df_ingestionsummary.write.mode('append').jdbc(jdbcUrl,"sqldbschema.Ingestion_Summary", properties=connectionProperties)

    #update Pipeline Summary table
    columns = StructType([StructField("Table_name", StringType(), False),
                      StructField("Run_Date", StringType(), False),
                      StructField("Run_ID", IntegerType(), False),
                      StructField("Layer", StringType(), False),
                      StructField("Status", StringType(), False)])
    
    if (meta_flag=='Success' and null_flag=='Success' and count_flag=='Success'):
        vals_pipelinesumm=[(target_object_name,current_date,run_id,'Raw','Success')]
        df_temp_pipelinesumm = spark.createDataFrame(vals_pipelinesumm, columns) 
    else:
        vals_pipelinesumm=[(target_object_name,current_date,run_id,'Raw','Failed')]
        df_temp_pipelinesumm = spark.createDataFrame(vals_pipelinesumm, columns) 

    df_temp_pipelinesumm.write.mode('append').jdbc(jdbcUrl,"sqldbschema.Pipeline_Summary", properties=connectionProperties)

    if (meta_flag=='Success' and null_flag=='Success' and count_flag=='Success'):
        return_value="1"
    else:
        return_value="0"

#condition checks for Parquet source

if object_type=='parquet':

    #get check results
    meta_flag=metadata_check("df_view","df1_view")
    count_flag=count_check("df_view","df1_view")
    null_flag=null_check("df_view","df1_view")
    
    #get current date
    from datetime import date
    current_date = str(date.today())

    #getMaximimRunIDfromPipelineSummaryTable for the object
    pushdown_query = "(Select * from sqldbschema.Pipeline_Summary) Pipeline_Summary"
    df_pipleline_summ = spark.read.jdbc(url=jdbcUrl, table=pushdown_query, properties=connectionProperties)
    df_pipleline_summ.registerTempTable('Pipeline_Summary')
    run_id=spark.sql("select ifnull(max(run_id)+1,1) from Pipeline_Summary where Table_Name ='"+target_object_name+"' and run_date='"+current_date+"'").first()[0]

    #update IngestionSummary table
    columns = StructType([StructField("Table_name", StringType(), False),
                      StructField("Run_Date", StringType(), False),
                      StructField("Run_ID", IntegerType(), False),
                      StructField("Check_Type", StringType(), False),
                      StructField("Status", StringType(), False)])                    
    
    vals_temp_count=[(target_object_name,current_date,run_id,'Count Check',count_flag)]
    df_temp_count = spark.createDataFrame(vals_temp_count, columns) 
    vals_temp_null=[(target_object_name,current_date,run_id,'Null Check',null_flag)]
    df_temp_null = spark.createDataFrame(vals_temp_null, columns) 
    vals_temp_meta=[(target_object_name,current_date,run_id,'Metadata Check',meta_flag)]
    df_temp_meta = spark.createDataFrame(vals_temp_meta, columns) 
    df_ingestionsummary=df_temp_count.union(df_temp_null).union(df_temp_meta)

    df_ingestionsummary.write.mode('append').jdbc(jdbcUrl,"sqldbschema.Ingestion_Summary", properties=connectionProperties)

    #update Pipeline Summary table
    columns = StructType([StructField("Table_name", StringType(), False),
                      StructField("Run_Date", StringType(), False),
                      StructField("Run_ID", IntegerType(), False),
                      StructField("Layer", StringType(), False),
                      StructField("Status", StringType(), False)])
    
    if (meta_flag=='Success' and null_flag=='Success' and count_flag=='Success'):
        vals_pipelinesumm=[(target_object_name,current_date,run_id,'Raw','Success')]
        df_temp_pipelinesumm = spark.createDataFrame(vals_pipelinesumm, columns) 
    else:
        vals_pipelinesumm=[(target_object_name,current_date,run_id,'Raw','Failed')]
        df_temp_pipelinesumm = spark.createDataFrame(vals_pipelinesumm, columns) 

    df_temp_pipelinesumm.write.mode('append').jdbc(jdbcUrl,"sqldbschema.Pipeline_Summary", properties=connectionProperties)

    if (meta_flag=='Success' and null_flag=='Success' and count_flag=='Success'):
        return_value="1"
    else:
        return_value="0"
